metadata.title: CVE-2021-47322 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: NFSv4:Fix an Oops in pnfs_mark_request_commit() when doing O_DIRECT Fix anOopsable condition in pnfs_mark_request_commit() when we're putting a setof writes on the commit list to reschedule them after a failed pNFSattempt.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
